entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of rain or snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
